channel.title: Notes on Half-bayesianism
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Half-bayesianism

item.title: I've started my personal site
item.description: Hi there! I would like to announce I will be writing technical posts on this website. Most of the design you see here is taken from the gorgeous consequently.org managed by Greg Restall, from whom some years ago I took the course series Logic: language and information on Coursera and absolutely fell in love with his sensitivity in choosing beautiful fonts for the lecture notes. On his website, that same sensibility is kept, which is seen through the amazing choice of calligraphy set.
